mng: to go upstream, to trace the source

exm.mng: to investigate the origin of sth, to trace a river upstream back to its source
lit. to go upstream, to trace sth back to, to date from
to recall, to look back upon
to pursue sth back to its origins, to trace back to the source, to get to the bottom of sth
to go back to the source
to go back to the source
see 追根溯源[zhui1 gen1 su4 yuan2]
